content:
Hi all,

Suppose I wanted to write a paper for an academic journal, but I wanted to write the paper in Lean, and have the ability to format it as a PDF in the style of the journal. Is there a standard way to accomplish this?

Thanks!
I think this is likely not yet supported, but is a long-term goal of Verso. @David Thrane Christiansen would know the precise state of things.
Edit -- whoops, I see you pointed me to the in-progress effort. Read your message too fast. Thanks!

HI @Ben Selfridge! Good to see you here :)

As you saw, this is something that Verso is designed to be able to do, but it's not something that's been implemented yet.
Ben Selfridge has marked this topic as resolved.
